Module: MySonos

All functions provided by My Sonos node. My Sonos node handles Music-Library and My-Sonos.
Since:
  • 2020-11-08
Author:
  • Henning Klages
Source:
  • sonos-manage-mysonos.js, line 14

Methods

(async, inner) libraryExportAlbum(node, msg, msg[stateName, stateName, cmdName, sonosPlayer)

Exports first Music-Library album matching search string (is encoded) - maximum 100
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node object used for debug message
msg object incoming message
msg[stateName string search string
stateName string default: payload - in compatibility mode: topic
cmdName string not used
sonosPlayer object Sonos Player with baseUrl
Source:
  • sonos-manage-mysonos.js, line 196
Throws:
all functions TODO Notion libraryExportAlbum TODO Notion libraryExportAlbum searchstring is blanks

(async, inner) libraryExportPlaylist(node, msg, msg[stateName, stateName, cmdName, sonosPlayer)

Exports first Music-Library playlist matching search string.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
node object used for debug message
msg object incoming message
msg[stateName string search string
msg.size number <optional>
 200 maxim number of playlists to be retrieved
stateName string default: payload - in compatibility mode: topic
cmdName string not used but signature libraryGetPlaylist
sonosPlayer object Sonos Player
Source:
  • sonos-manage-mysonos.js, line 238
Throws:
all functions TODO Notion libraryExportAlbum: msg.size is obsolete

(async, inner) libraryGetAlbums(node, msg, msg[stateName, stateName, cmdName, sonosPlayer)

Outputs array Music-Library albums - search string is optional
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node object used for debug message
msg object incoming message
msg[stateName string search string
msg.requestedCount string optional, maximum number of found albums, 0...999, default 100
msg.searchTitle string search string, optional
stateName string default: payload - in compatibility mode: topic
cmdName string not used
sonosPlayer object Sonos Player plus baseUrl
Source:
  • sonos-manage-mysonos.js, line 271
Throws:
all functions TODO Notion libraryExportAlbum

(async, inner) libraryGetPlaylists(node, msg, stateName, cmdName, sonosPlayer)

Outputs array of Music-Library playlists as object.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node object current node
msg object incoming message
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
size number <optional>
 200 maximum number of playlists to be retrieved, integer 1 .. 999
stateName string not used
cmdName string not used
sonosPlayer object Sonos Player
Source:
  • sonos-manage-mysonos.js, line 326
Throws:
all functions. if total is missing or total is !== 0 and items are missing

(async, inner) mysonosGetItems(node, msg, stateName, cmdName, sonosPlayer) → {object}

Outputs array of My-Sonos items as object.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node object not used
msg object incoming message
stateName string not used
cmdName string not used
sonosPlayer object Sonos Player
Source:
  • sonos-manage-mysonos.js, line 432
Throws:
nrcsp error - all functions
Returns:
payload = array of my Sonos items {title, albumArt, uri, metadata, sid, upnpClass, processingType} uri, metadata, sid, upnpclass: empty string are allowed
Type
object

(async, inner) mysonosQueueItem(node, msg, msg[stateName, stateName, cmdName, sonosPlayer)

Queues (aka add) first My-Sonos item matching search string.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node object not used
msg object incoming message
msg[stateName string search string
stateName string default: payload - in compatibility mode: topic
cmdName string not
msg.filter object optional, example: { processingType: "queue", mediaType: "playlist", serviceName: "all" }
sonosPlayer object Sonos Player
Source:
  • sonos-manage-mysonos.js, line 457
Throws:
nrcsp-error all functions Info: msg.filter currently undocumented feature.

(async, inner) processInputMsg(node, config, msg, ipaddress)

Validate sonos player object, command and dispatch further.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
node object current node for debug, warning, ...
config object current node configuration
Properties
Name Type Description
command string the command from node dialog
state string the state from node dialog
compatibilityMode boolean tic from node dialog
msg object incoming message
ipaddress string IP address of sonos player Creates also msg.nrcspCmd because in compatibility mode all get commands overwrite msg.payload (the command)
Source:
  • sonos-manage-mysonos.js, line 111

(inner) SonosManageMySonosNode(config)

Create My Sonos node, get valid ip address, store nodeDialog and subscribe to messages.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
config object current node configuration data
